DataElement.preferredName: Post Radiation Exposure Event Visit Timepoint Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description that represents the period of the post radiation exposure event follow-up visit.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Post Radiation Exposure Event Visit Timepoint
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Exposure to radioactive materials or ionizing radiation, whether by external irradiation, contact or contamination with radioactive material, or incorporation of radioactive materials, as in the case of certain diagnostic procedures._Something that happens at a given place and time._The act of going to see some person or place or thing; it can cover a short or long period but refers to a non-permanent arrangement._A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:No Value Exists:Something that happens at a given place and time.:The act of going to see some person or place or thing; it can cover a short or long period but refers to a non-permanent arrangement.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.

Exposure to radioactive materials or ionizing radiation, whether by external irradiation, contact or contamination with radioactive material, or incorporation of radioactive materials, as in the case of certain diagnostic procedures.
Something that happens at a given place and time.
The act of going to see some person or place or thing; it can cover a short or long period but refers to a non-permanent arrangement.

Property.preferredDefinition: A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.

Concepts.definition: A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the identification of patients' medical records and forms.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Post Radiation Exposure Event Timepoint Type
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Exposure to radioactive materials or ionizing radiation, whether by external irradiation, contact or contamination with radioactive material, or incorporation of radioactive materials, as in the case of certain diagnostic procedures._Something that happens at a given place and time._A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event._Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::1: The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::100_The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: 2023-12-13 The Definition contained extra spaces at the end. this was causing an error for NMDP using the API. I removed the extra spaces.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::2: The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::6: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
